summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Super Gamer application. All major features working correctly including JWT authentication, gaming/hero sections, comment system, theme toggle, and route protection. Backend API 91.7% success rate, frontend 100% functional.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access

passed_tests: User registration with email, name, and password
User login with email and password
Gaming section (dark mode) with item cards
Hero section (light mode) with item cards
Theme toggle (dark/light mode) on all pages
Frontend user flows (8/8 major flows passed)
